description: Gets a business glossary term in Amazon DataZone.

parameters.name: domainIdentifier
parameters.description: The ID of the Amazon DataZone domain in which this business glossary term exists.

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: The ID of the business glossary term.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the business glossary term was created.

nested_items.name: createdBy
nested_items.description: The Amazon DataZone user who created the business glossary.

nested_items.name: domainId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon DataZone domain in which this business glossary term exists.

nested_items.name: glossaryId
nested_items.description: The ID of the business glossary to which this term belongs.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The ID of the business glossary term.

nested_items.name: longDescription
nested_items.description: The long description of the business glossary term.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the business glossary term.

nested_items.name: shortDescription
nested_items.description: The short decription of the business glossary term.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the business glossary term.

nested_items.name: termRelations
nested_items.description: The relations of the business glossary term.

nested_items.name: classifies
nested_items.description: The classifies of the term relations.

nested_items.name: isA
nested_items.description: The isA property of the term relations.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the business glossary term was updated.

nested_items.name: updatedBy
nested_items.description: The Amazon DataZone user who updated the business glossary term.
